channel.title: Comments on: Day 4 – The wrap up

item.title: By: Kevin Pettitt
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pettitt
item.description: <p>Hey Matt,</p><p>Enjoyed getting more time to hang out with you this year. Sorry there wasn't time for proper good-byes before my mad dash to the airport after the comedian.</p><p>I heard a lot of praise for your Ajax web name picker from others at the show, so hat's off for that. Looking forward to delving into that area soon.</p><p>See you on-line <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>></p><p>Kev</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hey Matt,

Enjoyed getting more time to hang out with you this year. Sorry there wasn’t time for proper good-byes before my mad dash to the airport after the comedian.

I heard a lot of praise for your Ajax web name picker from others at the show, so hat’s off for that. Looking forward to delving into that area soon.

See you on-line http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>

Kev
